name: bot-deployment
description: Deploys a bot to Azure and connects it with channels
author: SOUTHWORKS

inputs.name: azureSubscription
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: resourceGroup
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of a resource group.

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location for deploying the resource group.

inputs.name: template
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing to the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: appId
inputs.label: App ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide an Azure App ID.

inputs.name: appSecret
inputs.label: App Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide an Azure App Secret.

inputs.name: botName
inputs.label: Bot's Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the bot.

inputs.name: zipFile
inputs.label: Zipped Bot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the compressed zip folder containing the bot.

inputs.name: botSku
inputs.label: Bot Sku
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the pricing tier of the Bot Service Registration. Acceptable values are F0 and S1. Default to F0.

inputs.name: directLineChannel
inputs.label: Direct Line
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Direct Line Channel.

inputs.name: slackChannel
inputs.label: Slack
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Slack Channel.

inputs.name: teamsChannel
inputs.label: Teams
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Teams Channel.

inputs.name: webexChannel
inputs.label: Webex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Webex Channel. A Webhook must be previously created with the following targetUrl: 'https://{your-bots-name}.azurewebsites.net/api/messages'

inputs.name: slackVerificationToken
inputs.label: Slack Verification Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the verification token from the Slack Application.

inputs.name: slackBotToken
inputs.label: Slack Bot Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the bot token from the Slack Application.

inputs.name: slackClientSigningSecret
inputs.label: Slack Client Signing Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the client signing secret from the Slack Application.

inputs.name: webexAccessToken
inputs.label: Webex Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the access token for the bot. Get one from 'https://developer.webex.com/'

inputs.name: webexSecret
inputs.label: Webex Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the secret configured in the webhook.

inputs.name: webexWebhookName
inputs.label: Webex Webhook Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the webhook.

inputs.name: validationMode
inputs.label: Validation Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check for validate whether the template is syntactically correct.
